title: Empower Your Business With Instant Diagnostics
subtitle: Free tools to diagnose, quantify, and plan your path to operational excellence
tagline: Make better decisions in minutes, not months. Try our expert-built calculators.

faq1.question: Is my data secure?
faq1.answer: Yes, encrypted and never shared. Deleted after 90 days unless you request follow-up.

faq2.question: Do you contact me after I use a tool?
faq2.answer: Only if you request a callback or book a discovery call. No unsolicited sales.

faq3.question: Can I use tools multiple times?

faq4.question: How accurate are the results?
faq4.answer: Built on TwelfthKey's industry benchmarks and G2P framework. Your report includes context and next-step recommendations.
